scripts.build_fmn: emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' -I src/nodes.h -I src/fm-net.h src/fm-net.c -o src/fm-net-c.wasm
scripts.build_wasm: wat2wasm src/ops.wat -o src/ops.wasm && node tools/wasm2js.js src/ops.wasm && node tools/wasm2js2.js src/fm-net-c.wasm
